stimulusHtml: How did Gottfried Lindauer’s artistic decisions shape his portrait of Tamati Waka Nene?
choicesHtml: He added traditional Maori clothing and regalia in order to emphasize his subject’s cultural heritage.
He painted his subject, based on observation, engaged in a traditional activity in order to document Maori daily life.
He used traditional Maori techniques for the portrayal of his subject in order to document Maori artistic traditions.
He included a detailed depiction of landscape in the background in order to communicate a patriotic message.
